Summary: 4 "Silver Surfer-like" silver fireballs/ufos with firey tails fell from the sky while slowly interchanging directions and weaving among each other
divs: sighting detailswhile driving home in the elizabethtown\hershey area, seen 4 silver fireballs with firey tails midway in the sky, towards the palmyra direction, which slowly were changing directions and weaving among each other. lasted about 12-15 seconds while i was driving, as i happened to look in the direction. unfortunately i couldnt get my cell cam on in time to capture. looked exactly what had been recently been seen in ca described as the "silver surfer ufos", though this was 4 "fireballs" vs the 2 seen in ca.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Elizabethtown
There were no other sightings in Elizabethtown on or around December 24th 2010
